languages.text: Shots from this gun always overpenetrate cover and destroy it in 1 hit if it's destructible.

traits.locale_text: Shots from this gun always overpenetrate cover and destroy it in 1 hit if it's destructible.

languages.text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Попадание{/g} из этого оружия мгновенно уничтожает разрушаемое {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытие{/g}. Как через разрушаемые, так и через неразрушаемые укрытия автоматически происходит сквозное пробитие.

traits.locale_text: Destructible covers hit by this stubber are instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

languages.text: Bu bodurcanın {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğu{/g} imha edilebilir {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperler{/g} anında yıkılır. Silahın atışları, imha edilebilir olsun olmasın tüm siperleri otomatik olarak delip geçer.
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: Bu bodurcanın vurduğu imha edilebilir siperler anında yıkılır. Silahın atışları, imha edilebilir olsun olmasın tüm siperleri otomatik olarak delip geçer.
Bu bodurcanın vurduğu imha edilebilir siperler anında yıkılır. Silahın atışları, imha edilebilir olsun olmasın tüm siperleri otomatik olarak delip geçer.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} vulnerable {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}alcanzada{/g} por esta ametralladora es destruida al instante. Tanto la cobertura vulnerable como la indestructible sufre sobrepenetración automáticamente.
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: La cobertura vulnerable alcanzada por esta ametralladora es destruida al instante. Tanto la cobertura vulnerable como la indestructible sufre sobrepenetración automáticamente.

languages.text: 当这把伐木枪{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}可摧毁的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}时，会将其立刻摧毁。这把伐木枪的子弹会穿透一切掩体，无论该掩体是否可摧毁。
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: 当这把伐木枪命中可摧毁的掩体时，会将其立刻摧毁。这把伐木枪的子弹会穿透一切掩体，无论该掩体是否可摧毁。

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvertures{/g} destructibles {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchées{/g} par cette mitrailleuse sont détruites instantanément. Toutes les couvertures sont automatiquement surpénétrées.
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: Les couvertures destructibles touchées par cette mitrailleuse sont détruites instantanément. Toutes les couvertures sont automatiquement surpénétrées.

languages.text: このスタッバーで{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}された破壊可能な{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}は即破壊される。破壊可能な遮蔽物と破壊不可能な遮蔽物の両方を自動的に過貫通する。
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: このスタッバーで攻撃された破壊可能な遮蔽物は即破壊される。破壊可能な遮蔽物と破壊不可能な遮蔽物の両方を自動的に過貫通する。
このスタッバーで攻撃された破壊可能な遮蔽物は即破壊される。破壊可能な遮蔽物と破壊不可能な遮蔽物の両方を自動的に過貫通する。

languages.text: Von dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffene{/g} zerstörbare {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} wird sofort zerstört. Zerstörbare und unzerstörbare Deckungen werden automatisch überdurchdrungen.
languages.original_text: Destructible {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this stubber is instantly destroyed. Both destructible and indestructible covers are automatically overpenetrated.

traits.locale_text: Von dieser Waffe getroffene zerstörbare Deckung wird sofort zerstört. Zerstörbare und unzerstörbare Deckungen werden automatisch überdurchdrungen.

traits.locale_text: Попадание из этого оружия мгновенно уничтожает разрушаемое укрытие. Как через разрушаемые, так и через неразрушаемые укрытия автоматически происходит сквозное пробитие.
Попадание из этого оружия мгновенно уничтожает разрушаемое укрытие. Как через разрушаемые, так и через неразрушаемые укрытия автоматически происходит сквозное пробитие.
